resource.name: Median Household Income
resource.description:
Track annual median household income for Town of Dumfries, Prince William County and the state of Virginia.

Data comes from the American Community Survey.
columns_name: Median Income in the past 12 months

resource.name: Public Safety
resource.description: This dataset is provided by Police Department of Town of Dumfries. It includes crimes against, property, persons and calls of service. Data set is updated monthly and always one month behind.

resource.name: GIS | Virginia County Boundaries
resource.description:
2019. US Census Bureau Cartographic Boundary File of county boundaries for the Commonwealth of Virginia.

From the US Census Bureau: "The cartographic boundary files are simplified representations of selected geographic areas from the Census Bureau’s MAF/TIGER geographic database. These boundary files are specifically designed for small scale thematic mapping."

resource.name: Covid-19 | Vaccine Doses Administered by Race and Ethnicity
resource.description:
March 2021 - Present. Vaccine doses administered to individuals in the Commonwealth of Virginia by race and ethnicity. Updated daily at 12:00 p.m.

From data.virginia.gov: "This dataset includes the number of people in each locality by vaccination status, race and ethnicity. The data set increases in size daily and as a result, the dataset may take longer to update; however, it is expected to be available by 12:00 noon daily."
columns_description: Date when the vaccination status count is published.
5-digit code (51XXX) for the locality.
Independent city or county in Virginia where the person lives who was administered the vaccine.
Health district name assigned by the Virginia Department of Health. There are 35 health districts in Virginia.
Health region name assigned by the Virginia Department of Health. There are 5 health regions in Virginia.
Values include: At Least One Dose, Fully Vaccinated
Reported race and ethnicity of the person vaccinated. Values include: Asian or Pacific Islander, Black, Latino, Native American, White, Other Race
Total number of people by vaccination status.

resource.name: Covid-19 | Vaccine Doses Administered by Sex
resource.description:
March 2021 - Present. Vaccine doses administered to individuals in the Commonwealth of Virginia by sex. Updated daily at 12:00 p.m.

From data.virginia.gov: "This dataset includes the number of people in each locality by vaccination status and sex. The data set increases in size daily and as a result, the dataset may take longer to update; however, it is expected to be available by 12:00 noon daily."
columns_description: Date when the vaccination status count is published.
5-digit code (51XXX) for the locality.
Independent city or county in Virginia where the person lives who was adminstered the vaccine.
Health district name assigned by the Virginia Department of Health. There are 35 health districts in Virginia.
Health region name assigned by the Virginia Department of Health. There are 5 health regions in Virginia.
Values include: At Least One Dose, Fully Vaccinated
Reported sex of the person vaccinated. Values include: Male, Female, Not Reported
Total number of people by vaccination status.

resource.name: GIS | US County Boundaries
resource.description:
2019. US Census Bureau Cartographic Boundary File of county boundaries for each state in the Unites States.

From the US Census Bureau: "The cartographic boundary files are simplified representations of selected geographic areas from the Census Bureau’s MAF/TIGER geographic database. These boundary files are specifically designed for small scale thematic mapping."

resource.name: Town Permit Total Processing Time
resource.description: This data set includes all permits fully processed by the Town with processing time measured in days. It is updated by the 15th every month with full report on previous month's data.

resource.name: 2021 Active Business Licenses for Town of Dumfries
resource.description: This data set includes all active business license information found registered in the Town of Dumfries as of March 1, 2021. This data will be updated yearly in March.

resource.name: Education Levels in the Town of Dumfries
resource.description: This data set calculates the Town’s education level by a percentage of persons over the age of 25 with a high school degree or higher and/or those with a bachelor's degree or higher. This data comes from the most recent U.S. Census provided by the United States Census Bureau. Data will be updated accordingly with the schedule of the U.S Census. https://data.census.gov/cedsci/profile?g=1600000US5123760

resource.name: Town of Dumfries Race Demographics
resource.description: This data set assesses racial demographic in the Town of Dumfries by percentage over the total population. This data comes from the most recent U.S. Census provided by the United States Census Bureau. Data will be updated accordingly with the schedule of the U.S Census. https://data.census.gov/cedsci/profile?g=1600000US5123760

resource.name: Digital Divide
resource.description: This data measures the digital inequities in the Town of Dumfries by calculating the population of users with or without a computer as well the percentages of those with or without broadband internet subscription. This data comes from the most recent U.S. Census provided by the United States Census Bureau. Data will be updated accordingly with the schedule of the U.S Census. https://data.census.gov/cedsci/profile?g=1600000US5123760

resource.name: End of Year Annual Financial Reporting
resource.description: The Town's end of fiscal year financial reporting.

resource.name: Socioeconomic Demographics
resource.description: This data set includes socioeconomic factors within the Town of Dumfries such as people in the labor force, people without health insurance, etc. This information comes from the most recent U.S. Census provided by the United States Census Bureau. Data will be updated accordingly with the schedule of the U.S Census. https://data.census.gov/cedsci/profile?g=1600000US5123760

domain_tags: language other than english spoken at home

resource.name: Covid-19 | Johns Hopkins CSSE Daily Reports (Virginia Only)
resource.description:
February 23rd, 2020 - Present. Daily reports of Covid-19 confirmed cases, deaths, and recoveries for the Commonwealth of Virginia. Updated daily at 10:00 a.m.

This data comes from the COVID-19 Data Repository by the Center for Systems Science and Engineering (CSSE) at Johns Hopkins University. This is the data repository for the 2019 Novel Coronavirus Visual Dashboard operated by the Johns Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering (JHU CSSE). Also, Supported by ESRI Living Atlas Team and the Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Lab (JHU APL).

https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19#covid-19-data-repository-by-the-center-for-systems-science-and-engineering-csse-at-johns-hopkins-university
resource.attribution: Center for Systems Science and Engineering (CSSE) at Johns Hopkins University

resource.name: Public Safety Community Events
resource.description: This dataset is provided by Police Department of the Town of Dumfries. It includes community events and public service occasions to create a safe environment and improve the quality of life for all our citizens. Data set is updated monthly and always one month behind.

resource.name: Demographics
resource.description: This data provided by the most recent U.S. Census include socioeconomic factors, housing, business firms, digital equity, education levels, race, age, and gender demographics for the population living in the Town of Dumfries. Data will be updated accordingly with the schedule of the U.S Census. https://data.census.gov/cedsci/profile?g=1600000US5123760

resource.name: 2022 Active Business Licenses for the Town of Dumfries
resource.description: This data set includes all active business license information found registered in the Town of Dumfries as of April 1, 2022. This data will be updated yearly in April.
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'GIS | US County Boundaries' (rsiu-kqvu) the point in column 'geo_reference_' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: Gender Demographics for Town of Dumfries
resource.description: This data assesses gender demographics of persons living in the Town of Dumfries. This data comes from the most recent U.S. Census provided by the United States Census Bureau. Data will be updated accordingly with the schedule of the U.S Census. https://data.census.gov/cedsci/profile?g=1600000US5123760

resource.name: Covid-19 | Cases
resource.description:
March 2020 - Present. An overview by locality of total cases, total hospitalizations and total deaths for the Commonwealth of Virginia. Updated daily at 12:00 p.m.

From data.virginia.gov: "This data set includes the cumulative (total) number of COVID-19 cases, hospitalizations, and deaths for each locality in Virginia by report date. This data set was first published on April 01, 2020. The data set increases in size daily and as a result, the dataset may take longer to update; however, it is expected to be available by 12:00 noon daily. When you download the data set, the dates will be sorted in ascending order, meaning that the earliest date will be at the top. To see data for the most recent date, please scroll down to the bottom of the data set. The Virginia Department of Health’s Thomas Jefferson Health District (TJHD) will be renamed to Blue Ridge Health District (BRHD), effective January 2021. More information about this change can be found here: https://www.vdh.virginia.gov/blue-ridge/name-change/"
columns_description: Date when the case, hospitalization, or death is published
5-digit code (51XXX) for the locality
Independent city or county in Virginia
Health district name assigned by the Virginia Department of Health. There are 35 health districts in Virginia.
Total number of COVID-19 cases
Total number of COVID-19 hospitalizations
Total number of COVID-19 deaths

resource.name: Housing Demographics Town of Dumfries
resource.description: This data set highlights housing demographics in the Town of Dumfries which includes the median gross rent, per capita income, average mortgage, and median value of owner-occupied housing units. This data comes from the most recent U.S. Census provided by the United States Census Bureau. Data will be updated accordingly with the schedule of the U.S Census. https://data.census.gov/cedsci/profile?g=1600000US5123760

resource.name: Covid-19 | Vaccine Doses Administered by Age Group
resource.description:
March 2021 - Present. Vaccine doses administered to individuals in the Commonwealth of Virginia by age group. Updated daily at 12:00 p.m.

From data.virginia.gov: "This dataset includes the number of people in each locality by vaccination status and age group. The data set increases in size daily and as a result, the dataset may take longer to update; however, it is expected to be available by 12:00 noon daily."
columns_description: Values include: At Least One Dose, Fully Vaccinated
Health region name assigned by the Virginia Department of Health. There are 5 health regions in Virginia.
Total number of people by vaccination status.
Date when the vaccination status count is published.
Age group in years of the person vaccinated. Values include: 0-9, 10-19, 20-29, 30-39, 40-49, 50-59, 60-69, 70-79, 80+, Not Reported
5-digit code (51XXX) for the locality.
Total number of adults (18+) by vaccination status.
Health district name assigned by the Virginia Department of Health. There are 35 health districts in Virginia.
Independent city or county in Virginia where the person lives who was adminstered the vaccine.

resource.name: Age Demographics for Town of Dumfries
resource.description: This data set collects the age demographics or persons under 5 years, 18 years, and 65 years of age living in the Town of Dumfries. This data comes from the most recent U.S. Census provided by the United States Census Bureau. Data will be updated accordingly with the schedule of the U.S Census. https://data.census.gov/cedsci/profile?g=1600000US5123760

resource.name: Real Estate Assessments
resource.description: This data set includes real estate information for all real estate property located in the Town of Dumfries.  This data will be updated annually in March.

resource.name: Business Firm Demographics
resource.description: This data contains information about all the business firms in the Town of Dumfries. This including men-owned, women-owned, veteran-owned, and minority-owned businesses. This data comes from the most recent U.S. Census provided by the United States Census Bureau. Data will be updated accordingly with the schedule of the U.S Census. https://data.census.gov/cedsci/profile?g=1600000US5123760

resource.name: Average Customer Service Transaction Time
resource.description: This data calculates the average time a transaction and wait times per customer occurs with processing time measured in minutes. The customer transactions are by appointment only. It is updated by the 15th every month with full report on previous month's data.

resource.name: Dumfries Community Policing Data Report
resource.description: A data collection consisting of all traffic and investigatory stops made in Dumfries, Virginia as aggregated by Dumfries Police Department. This information is updated quarterly during the months of October, January, April, and July.

resource.name: Employment by Occupation
resource.description: This data measure employment by occupation  in the Town of Dumfries from 2017 to 2020. This information comes from the American Community Survey.

resource.name: Budget vs Actual
resource.description: These are the financial reports for Town of Dumfries. Updated at the close of every month. Always one month behind.

resource.name: Employment by Industry
resource.description: This data measure employment by industry in the Town of Dumfries from 2017 to 2020. This information comes from the American Community Survey.

resource.name: Covid-19 | Vaccine Doses Administered
resource.description:
December 2020 - Present. Vaccine doses administered daily in the Commonwealth of Virginia. Updated daily from data.virginia.gov at 12:00 p.m.

From data.virginia.gov: "This dataset includes the number of COVID-19 vaccine doses administered for each locality in Virginia by administration date and by facility type. The data set increases in size daily and as a result, the dataset may take longer to update; however, it is expected to be available by 12:00 noon daily."
columns_description: Date when the vaccine dose is administered to a person.
5-digit code (51XXX) for the locality
Independent city or county in Virginia where the person lives who was administered the vaccine.
Health district name assigned by the Virginia Department of Health. There are 35 health districts in Virginia.
Facility type of the provider that performed the vaccine administration.
Name of the manufacturing company that produced the vaccine.
Dose number for the person who is administered the vaccine.
Total number of vaccine doses administered.

resource.name: Permit Application Review Time
resource.description: This data highlights the permit review time for zoning, landuse and interagency applications processed for the Town. This data is updated by the 15th of every month and is always one month behind.
resource.attribution: Planning & Community Development Department of Town of Dumfries

domain_tags: department of planning and community development
